dcterms:creator: WAEMU Commission
dcterms:description: The Harmonized Survey on Households Living Standards provides comprehensive data on household demographics, economic activities, and living conditions in Senegal, which is used to analyze the relationship between land holdings and household decisions in the context of agricultural productivity and health.
dcterms:title: Harmonized Survey on Households Living Standards, Senegal 2018-2019

dcterms:creator: J. Rohr
A. Sack
C. Haggerty
dcterms:description: This dataset includes data and code related to a planetary health innovation aimed at addressing disease, food, and water challenges in Africa, providing insights into the ecological and health impacts of agricultural practices.
dcterms:title: Data and Code for “A planetary health innovation for disease, food, and water challenges in Africa”
